name: DesktopVRIK
author: NotAKidoS
description:
Adds VRIK to Desktop avatars. No longer will you be a liveless sliding statue~!
Adds the small feet stepping when looking around on Desktop.

Optional BTKUILib integration.
changelog:
- Enable useAnimatedBendNormal when Locomotion tracking is disabled. This fixes some sitting animations that bend at unnatural angles.
- Fix avatar root offset not being reset when entering/playing emotes.
